2.action:
Add the following lines to a .bb file. For expample, meta/recipes-connectivity/openssh/openssh_6.2p2.bb:   

pkg_postinst_ontarget_${PN} () {  
       #!/bin/sh -e  
       if [ x"$D" = "x" ]; then  
       echo "List directory to check the output log"  
       ls /  
       echo "List nonexist directory to check the stderr redirection log"  
       ls /nonexist  
       else  
       exit 1  
       fi  
}  

Make sure the feature "debug-tweaks" is added in conf/local.conf
